segments.text: Sorry ! Excuse me ! I got your message .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Taylor ? Taylor ! Is this a joke ? Is it really you ? But ... but ... everyone said you were dead !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's OK . Just let it out . I'm OK ! I was out of town with ... Femi .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Taylor ! I'm so ... so happy . But then ... who's that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Taylor Smith . But not me . The pallbearers are carrying out the casket . It would be rude to just leave . Let's follow .
segments.speaker: S1
